name: MadLibsBot
description:
You will need a coding text editor like Sublime or Notepad++.
To run the bot yourself, simply download this file and replace the token on line 70.

Alternately, you can add it to your server by clicking this link: https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=842465619517767751&permissions=97344&scope=bot

The bot is very basic, and so only includes one Mad Libs story at the moment.
